parameter.name: Add write permission to App_Data Folder
parameter.description: Add write permission to App_Data folder

parameter.name: DBConnection-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: DBConnection 由应用程序在 web.config 中用来访问数据库的连接字符串。
parameter.value: metadata=res://*/DBModel.csdl|res://*/DBModel.ssdl|res://*/DBModel.msl;provider=System.Data.SqlClient;provider connection string="data source=.;initial catalog=yyCms;persist security info=True;user id=sa;password=123456;MultipleActiveResultSets=True;App=EntityFramework"
